name.text: 9.3.2.1 formula for finding the scalar product

questiontext.text:
A formula for finding the scalar product En formel for å finne skalarproduktet

We can use the results summarized previously to obtain a formula for finding a scalar product when the vectors are given in Cartesian form. We consider vectors in the \(xy\)-plane. Suppose \(\underline{a}=a_1\underline{i} + a_2\underline{j}\) and \(\underline{b}=b_1\underline{i}+b_2\underline{j}\). Then Vi kan bruke resultatene beskrevet tidligere for å få en formel for å finne et skalarprodukt når vektorene er gitt i kartesisk form. Vi tar for oss vektorer i \(xy\)-planet. Anta \(\underline{a}=a_1\underline{i} + a_2\underline{j}\) og \(\underline{b}=b_1\underline{i}+b_2\underline{j}\). Deretter


\[\begin{aligned} \underline{a}\cdot\underline{b}&=(a_1\underline{i}+a_2\underline{j})\cdot(b_1\underline{i}+b_2\underline{j})\\ &= a_1\underline{i}\cdot(b_1\underline{i}+b_2\underline{j}) + a_2\underline{j}\cdot(b_1\underline{i}+b_2\underline{j})\\ &= a_1b_1\underline{i}\cdot\underline{i} + a_1b_2\underline{i}\cdot\underline{j} + a_2b_1\underline{j}\cdot\underline{i}+a_2b_2\underline{j}\cdot\underline{j}\end{aligned}\]

Thus to find the scalar product of two vectors their \(\underline{ i}\) components are multiplied together, their \(\underline{ j}\) components are multiplied together and the results are added. For å finne skalarproduktet av to vektorer multipliseres deres \(\underline{ i}\)-komponenter sammen, deres \(\underline{ j}\)-komponenter multipliseres sammen og resultatene legges til.

Using the results explained in a previous Key Point, we can simplify this to give the following formula: Ved å bruke resultatene forklart i et tidligere nøkkelpunkt, kan vi forenkle dette for å gi følgende formel:

Key Point Nøkkelpunkt

\[\hbox{If} \quad \underline{ a}=a_1\underline{ i} + a_2\underline{ j}\quad\hbox{ and }\quad \underline{ b}=b_1\underline{ i}+b_2\underline{ j}\quad \hbox{  then }\] \[\underline{ a}\cdot\underline{b}= a_1b_1+a_2b_2\] \[\hbox{Hvis} \quad \underline{ a}=a_1\underline{ i} + a_2\underline{ j}\quad\hbox{ og }\quad \underline{ b}=b_1\underline{ i}+b_2\underline{ j}\quad \hbox{  da er }\] \[\underline{ a}\cdot\underline{b}= a_1b_1+a_2b_2\]


Thus to find the scalar product of two vectors their >\(\underline{ i}\) components are multiplied together, their \(\underline{ j}\) components are multiplied together and the results are added. For å finne skalarproduktet av to vektorer multipliseres >\(\underline{ i}\)-komponentene deres, deres \(\underline{ j}\)-komponenter multipliseres sammen og resultatene legges til.

Example Eksempel

If \(\underline{ a}=7\underline{ i}+8\underline{ j}\) and \(\underline{ b}=5\underline{ i}-2\underline{ j}\), find the scalar product \(\underline{a}\cdot\underline{b}\). Hvis \(\underline{ a}=7\underline{ i}+8\underline{ j}\) og \(\underline{ b}=5\underline{ i}-2\underline{ j}\), finn skalrproduktet \(\underline{a}\cdot\underline{b}\).

Solution Løsning

We use the previous Key Point: \(\qquad\underline{ a}\cdot\underline{ b} = (7\underline{ i}+8\underline{ j})\cdot(5\underline{i}-2\underline{ j})= (7)(5) + (8)(-2)= 35-16= 19\) Vi bruker det forrige nøkkelpunktet: \(\qquad\underline{ a}\cdot\underline{ b} = (7\underline{ i}+8\underline{ j})\cdot(5\underline{i}-2 \underline{ j})= (7)(5) + (8)(-2)= 35-16= 19\)


The formula readily generalises to vectors in three dimensions as follows Formelen generaliserer lett til vektorer i tre dimensjoner som følger :

Key Point Nøkkelpunkt

\[\hbox{If} \quad \underline{ a}=a_1\underline{ i} + a_2\underline{ j} + a_3\underline{ k}\quad \hbox{ and }\quad\underline{ b}=b_1\underline{ i}+b_2\underline{ j} + b_3\underline{ k} \hbox{  then }\] \[\underline{ a}\cdot\underline{b} = a_1b_1 + a_2b_2 + a_3b_3\] \[\hbox{Hvis} \quad \underline{ a}=a_1\underline{ i} + a_2\underline{ j} + a_3\underline{ k}\quad \hbox{ og }\quad\underline{ b}=b_1\underline{ i}+b_2\underline{ j} + b_3\underline{ k} \hbox{  da er }\] \[\underline{ a}\cdot\underline{b} = a_1b_1 + a_2b_2 + a_3b_3\]

Example Eksempel

If \(\underline{ a}=5\underline{ i}+3\underline{ j}-2\underline{ k}\) and \(\underline{ b}=8\underline{i}-9\underline{ j}+11\underline{ k}\), find \(\underline{a}\cdot\underline{b}\). Hvis \(\underline{ a}=5\underline{ i}+3\underline{ j}-2\underline{ k}\) og \(\underline{ b}=8\underline{i}-9\underline { j}+11\underline{k}\), finn \(\underline{a}\cdot\underline{b}\).

Solution Løsning

We use the formula in the previous Key Point: Vi bruker formelen i forrige nøkkelpunkt:

\(\qquad \underline{ a}\cdot\underline{b}=(5)(8) + (3)(-9) + (-2)(11) = 40-27-22=-9\)

Note again that the result is a scalar: there are no \(\underline{ i}\)’s, \(\underline{ j}\)’s, or \(\underline{k}\)’s in the answer. Merk igjen at resultatet er en skalar: det er ingen \(\underline{ i}\)'er, \(\underline{ j}\)'er eller \(\underline{k}\)'er i svar.

The above result is generally true: Resultatet ovenfor er generelt sant:

Key Point Nøkkelpunkt

v For enhver vektor \(\underline{ r}\),     \(|\underline{r}|^2=\underline{r}\cdot\underline{r}\)
